title: My Ap Shaco :(
body:
I have been on massive win streaks since I've started doing Ap shaco first game i did it thought because someone wanted top i might troll 
like I've done shaco top before but thats ad but i found when i did ap i won when i didn't mean to, But anyway after finishing tonights massive rank spell I've now skipped gold 4 and went into gold 3 which I'm  like half points points though just by playing ap shaco AND after all that the games I've played at least 1 person in every game gets so mad and toxic that they would start swearing and telling me how bad i am and how unskilled ap shaco is…
Um no dude you need to correctly place boxes you need to know how to use your clone MAIN source of damage to 1 shot someone. Yeh e might be a click to win but hay at least I've seen your match history and all you play is zed and kat sorry but don't call someone unskilled when you play those champions heaps XD Makes me laugh every time 
13/2 with shaco having a 7 win steak and currently on a 5 win streak.

replies.body: I played AP shaco support here and there when I was Bronze, I would get flamed during champion select and at the start of the game. However once the game was going people would change their minds. Place boxes in brushes and when either the enemy support or adc walks there it's a free kill. I would always place several boxes than walk up to their tower to make my hp low...they would follow me into brush and I would kill them with box damage, e + ignite. Also another thing I loved doing was sitting in enemy jungle (mostly raptor brush) with a pink ward in a brush that had several boxes and wait for someone to facecheck, as soon as they walk in they go 100 - 0 instantly. AP shaco is fun to play and very strong, although I do recommend playing it in norms for fun. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Ekrah,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=1Q6kE7Gl,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-20T18:13:57.525+0000)
>
> I played AP shaco support here and there when I was Bronze, I would get flamed during champion select and at the start of the game. However once the game was going people would change their minds. Place boxes in brushes and when either the enemy support or adc walks there it's a free kill. I would always place several boxes than walk up to their tower to make my hp low...they would follow me into brush and I would kill them with box damage, e + ignite. Also another thing I loved doing was sitting in enemy jungle (mostly raptor brush) with a pink ward in a brush that had several boxes and wait for someone to facecheck, as soon as they walk in they go 100 - 0 instantly. AP shaco is fun to play and very strong, although I do recommend playing it in norms for fun. :P

Yeh I've done ap sup here and thereâ€¦ But why keep it in ranks its just like any other champion if you are really good at it and are winning heaps then you are able to play in ranks try to win with it there its not only a normals thing. as I'm currently like 14/4 with it and like 2/3 even more are playing AP top or mid shaco. But some of the loses are from playing ad jungle think i will stick to ap xD
Only play viable champs or i'll report u

> [{quoted}](name=WEETBIX 4 BREKKI,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=1Q6kE7Gl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-17T15:27:17.470+0000)
>
> Only play viable champs or i'll report u

Do that then xD won't stop me

>you need to correctly place boxes

Box in a path the enemy will walk

Much skill.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=1Q6kE7Gl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-17T03:26:06.093+0000)
>
> Box in a path the enemy will walk
> 
> Much skill.

No thats the easy way there is heaps of ways you can place it. Illuminati shaco, Put boxes in river like teemo shrooms, The easy way just place it in front of the enemy. Yes people that don't play shaco say its easy and no skill when actually it does each champions takes a little skill and understanding of the champion before you can start winning. 
But hay haters gonna hate

DW about the haters bra, just play who ya love, and u appear to love shaco. Dw bout the haters, last season everyone hated on me for playen naut jg, cos they wanted a vi, kha zix and elise ect.
 Ur wrecken without followen the meta so props to u bra :) you got any other meta-crushers that you favour?

> [{quoted}](name=LOKI3974,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=1Q6kE7Gl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-16T23:24:48.517+0000)
>
> DW about the haters bra, just play who ya love, and u appear to love shaco. Dw bout the haters, last season everyone hated on me for playen naut jg, cos they wanted a vi, kha zix and elise ect.
>  Ur wrecken without followen the meta so props to u bra :) you got any other meta-crushers that you favour?

Well I'm one of those that like to play non-meta things like Full ap Sejuani, Elise mid, Adc Gangplank, Jungle sona done it in ranks went 2/0/8 with the team still having a go at me saying it was a stupid pick and more but yeh i love trying something new Thank you :)
